name: nexcloud-workflow
description: NexCloud-workflow is buisness component for NexCloud. It retrieves metrics from Kafka collected by NexCloud-collector and calculates metrics, then insets calcuated metrics to databases(Redis, InfluxDBf, MySQL)
preInstallNotes: It needs NexCloud-collector for collecting Mesos, Marathon metrics and databases such as Influx, MySQL, Redis, Kafka before the installation of Nexcloud-workflow.
